statements: SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE username = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM user_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM user_feedback;
SELECT user_id, username, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating < 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT rating, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM user_feedback GROUP BY rating HAVING total_count > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feature_name, impact_score FROM game_features WHERE impact_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, feedback, timestamp FROM user_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, feedback FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%awesome%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feature_name, impact_score FROM game_features WHERE impact_score > 8 ORDER BY feature_name ASC;
SELECT description FROM game_features WHERE feature_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY feature_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS feedback_count FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 2 ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;

SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM GameFeatures ORDER BY feature_name ASC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM Review WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.feedback_text, r.rating FROM UserFeedback u INNER JOIN Review r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.rating < 3;

SELECT * FROM game_features WHERE feature_name LIKE 'multiplayer%' AND feature_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, SUM(games_played) AS total_games_played FROM user_stats GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_games_played > 50;
